home.freeEntryText: Every Tuesday we have free entry from
home.ticketCountValidationText: Group tickets count is more than available tickets
home.eventBookingClosed: Sorry, Event booking is closed or ended.
home.gstInNote: Do you prefer bill with GSTIN (Enter buyers GSTIN)
home.gstInB2C: Note-: Incase of invalid/cancelled GSTIN , this booking shall be consider as personal (B2C) booking

validation.requiredAgreeCheckbox: Please check if you want to proceed

questionAnswerModal.title: Please fill below form before proceed
questionAnswerModal.agreeWithQuestions: I hereby acknowledge that all answers are correct

TermsAndConditions.nonTransferrable: This ticket isnon-transferrable and non-refundable. Please refer to the museum policy for exceptions.
TermsAndConditions.discountedEntryTicketEligibility: Please carry your relevant ID card with you to avail the discounted entry ticket (applicable to Senior Citizens, Defense Personnel, People with disabilities, 19-25 year old students).
TermsAndConditions.galleryEventAccessEntitlement: The ticket you receive will entitle you to access the gallery/ies and event/s stated on the front of this ticket.
TermsAndConditions.singleDateValidity: It is valid only on the date stated on the front of the ticket.
TermsAndConditions.TicketRetentionNotice: During your visit you must retain your ticket safely for production on demand by our representative(s).
TermsAndConditions.nonRefundableDonationsNotice: The Museum cannot refund any donations made at the time of purchasing the ticket.
TermsAndConditions.accessRequirementsAssistance: Should you have any access requirements, please speak to a member of staff and they will be happy to assist.
TermsAndConditions.childrenUnder12SupervisionPolicy: Children under 12 must always be accompanied by an adult within the Museum premises. Exceptions may only be made for specific closed-door programs with pre-agreed terms and conditions.
TermsAndConditions.visitorRegulationsAgreement: If you are visiting the galleries, you agree to be bound by and to abide by our Visitor regulations, as stated here:
TermsAndConditions.baggagePolicy: Backpacks and suitcases of any size are not allowed. Handbags and purses up to 40cm x 40cm are allowed.
TermsAndConditions.foodNotAllowed: Food and drinks are not allowed.
TermsAndConditions.artworkHandlingGuidelines: Please do not touch artworks, unless the label indicates it is a tactile response.
TermsAndConditions.prohibitedArtSupplies: The use of charcoal, pastels, permanent markers and watercolor or oil paint is not allowed.
TermsAndConditions.cameraandFlashPolicy: The use of flash, camera supports and selfie sticks is not permitted.
TermsAndConditions.professionalFilmingandPhotographyPolicy: Filming and photography with professional equipment requires prior written consent from the Museum management.
TermsAndConditions.photographyandFilmingConsentReminder: Please only photograph or film people with their consent.
TermsAndConditions.noPetsAllowed: Pets are not allowed in the galleries, with the exception of guide dogs for the visually impaired.
